name: Hidden-markov-model
tagline: This Code Implements the Hidden Markov Model (Monitoring and the Viterbi Algorithm) in Python on a Time series Data.
body:
This Code Implements the Hidden Markov Model (Monitoring and the Viterbi Algorithm) in Python on a Time series Data. 
The plot below shows the dataset used.

![](https://github.com/deerishi/Hidden-Markov-Model/blob/master/mog1.png?raw=True)
